projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here is a selection of projects completed during my training at Ã‰cole 42 as well as personal projects
projects.japan_desc: Complete redesign of the company's internal portal to improve management and user experience.
projects.japan_tech: Full stack development with React and Tailwind for the front-end, Laravel Inertia for the back-end.
projects.timequest_desc: TimeQuest is a mobile game where players must guess the date of significant events as quickly as possible. Playable solo or multiplayer.
projects.timequest_wip: ğŸš§ This project is still under development ğŸš§
projects.portfolio_desc: Design and development of the front-end of this site to showcase my projects
projects.transcendence_desc: Final project at Ã‰cole 42 aimed at creating a pong game and integrating advanced features
projects.inception_desc: Configuration and orchestration of Docker containers for a networked development infrastructure
projects.irc_desc: Implementation of an IRC server in C++ enabling network communication and multi-client management
projects.cpp_desc: Introduction to object-oriented programming with C++, covering its basics and advanced features
projects.cub3d_desc: 3D game inspired by Wolfenstein, using raycasting techniques to display an immersive world
projects.netpractice_desc: Introduction project on fundamental network systems concepts
projects.minishell_desc: Creation of a shell in C (command management, pipes, redirections, ...)
projects.philosophers_desc: Simulation of the dining philosophers problem, exploring concurrent programming and thread management
projects.pipex_desc: Project that recreates a simplified version of the Unix pipe command, enabling inter-process communication through pipes in C
projects.push_swap_desc: Sorting algorithms in C, with optimization to sort a stack with minimum movements
projects.so_long_desc: Simple 2D game in C, combining event management, game logic, and graphical display with the MiniLibX library
projects.born2beroot_desc: System administration project, with installation and configuration of a secure virtual machine
projects.gnl_desc: Creation of a function to read a line from a file at a time, a challenge to understand buffer management in C
projects.printf_desc: Personal version of the printf function, highlighting format management and advanced string manipulation in C
projects.libft_desc: Development of a standard library in C, recreating basic functions to strengthen understanding of language mechanisms
